alert.note: Alert for Chittenden; Franklin; Grand Isle; Lamoille (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 2:23PM EDT until July 09 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lamoille County in northwestern Vermont... Southeastern Grand Isle County in northwestern Vermont... Northeastern Chittenden County in northwestern Vermont... Southwestern Franklin County in northwestern Vermont... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 223 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Essex, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Essex Junction, Underhill, Cambridge, Cambridge Village, Essex, Westford, Jericho Village, Jeffersonville Village, Essex Junction Village, Fairfax, Fletcher, Milton, Waterville, Georgia, Bakersfield, Colchester, Jericho, South Hero, Williston, and Grand Isle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
